Top-level script that loads models and runs the video emotion detection loop.
Main script orchestrating model loading, video capture, face detection, and Grad-CAM visualization.
Top-level script that sets up parameters, data generators, model, callbacks, loads data, and starts training.
Top‐level script executing the emotion and gender detection pipeline.
Redirects root URL to ekholabs.ai with HTTP 302.
Handles image upload, processes it and returns the classified image or aborts on error.
Custom handler for HTTP 400 errors, returning a JSON error message.
Custom handler for HTTP 404 errors, returning a JSON error message.
Main function to detect faces in an image, classify emotion and gender, annotate and save the result.

nodes.description: Constructor for DataManager: sets dataset_name, path, image_size and resolves default paths or raises on unknown name.
Dispatch method to load the appropriate dataset based on dataset_name.
Loads and filters the IMDB dataset from a .mat file, returns mapping of image paths to gender labels.
Loads FER2013 CSV, converts pixel strings to resized arrays and one-hot encodes emotions.
Walks KDEF directory, loads, resizes images, maps filenames to emotion classes and builds arrays.
Returns label mapping for provided dataset name or raises on invalid.
Returns a mapping from class names to integer indices for a given dataset.
Splits IMDB ground truth dict into training and validation keys, with optional shuffling.
Splits arrays x and y into training and validation sets by a given ratio.
Normalize image array x to [0,1], then optionally scale to [-1,1] if v2=True.

Resize image array using scipy.misc.imresize.
Convert integer class labels to one-hot encoded matrix.

Pass through the output shape for the target category loss layer.
Normalize tensor by its L2 norm.
Expand dims and preprocess an input image array.
Register a custom guided backpropagation gradient for ReLU.

Override ReLU gradient and reload model for guided backpropagation.
Convert a tensor into a displayable uint8 RGB image.

Script entrypoint: load data, build mosaics, visualize kernels from a trained model.
Builds a simple sequential CNN model with multiple Conv2D, BatchNormalization, Activation, Pooling, Dropout, and GlobalAveragePooling layers.
Builds a reduced sequential CNN with strided convolutions, BatchNormalization, Activation, Dropout, and Flatten layers.
Constructs a compact Xception-style model with separable convolutions, residual connections, BatchNormalization, Activation, Pooling, and GlobalAveragePooling.
Smaller Xception-style model variant with fewer filters and separable convolution modules, residual connections, and GlobalAveragePooling.
Larger Xception-style architecture with initial Conv2D blocks, separable convolution modules, residual merges, and GlobalAveragePooling.
Entry point: sets input shape and num_classes, invokes simple_CNN and prints model summary.
